function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air filtration leading to transmission of airborne viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Proper installation, maintenance, and monitoring of air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, antimicrobial agents","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Facility management, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Uncertain impact of biofiltration technology on disease transmission","Impact":"Ineffective air filtration leading to potential spread of contagions","Mitigation":"Further research and infrastructure development for biofiltration technology","Technologies":"Green wall, microalgae structure","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Environmental engineers, architects"},{"Description":"Potential emission of ozone from bipolar ionization technology","Impact":"Harmful effects on human health due to ozone emission","Mitigation":"More scientific studies and careful integration of bipolar ionization technology","Technologies":"Bipolar ionization, high-voltage electrodes","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"HVAC technicians, environmental engineers"}]}
